page.title: 20Industry in Chorley
page.content:
In Chorley engineering is mainly light. There are a few furniture makers such as Dickinsons. There are also some mills,for example The Talbot which is situated at the bottom of Baggenly Lane. There are also little industries which make such things as keys and locks.A large new employer is the brewery on the south east of the town and built virtually on the banks of the Leeds Liverpool canal.
The entries for Chorley were compiled by Mr.W.Sloan the Deputy Headteacher of St.Peter's school Chorley from information collected by pupils from St.Peter's school,St.Jame's school and St.Lawrence's school all in Chorley.
